title: Killsquad Skin Pack Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Killsquad Skin Pack Steam Key and unlock unique SteelSeries Heroes Skins for Killsquad! Please note the base game is required.
instructions:
1. Log in to your free Seelseries account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your key (Base game required).

title: Midnight Ghost Hunt: Lars the Troll Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Midnight Ghost Hunt Exclusive Lars the Troll In-Game Item Key (Steam) and add Lars the Troll to your collection! Please note the base game Midnight Ghost Hunt is required to enjoy this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Log in to your free Seelseries account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your key.

title: Dying Light 2: Wyvern Paraglider Skin
description: Claim your free Dying Light 2: Wyvern Paraglider Skin! Please note the base game Dying Light 2 is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Scroll down and click the claim button
2. Login or register your free TechlandGG account.
platforms: PC, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: Minecraft: Croco Island (DLC)
description: Score Minecraft: Croco Island (DLC) for free and explore this tropical Lacoste theme park! The DLC features a tennis court, a parkour course, a minigame, a scavenger hunt, and a giant crocodile. This DLC is available until December 31, 2022.
instructions:
1. Open up the Marketplace on your favorite device and download the pack.
2. Have fun!
platforms: PC, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Slapshot Rebound In-Game Currency Key ($5 Value)

instructions:

2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Minecraft: YouTube Creators Skin Pack
description: Grab this Minecraft: YouTube Creators Skin Pack and unlock 10+ skins from some of your favorite Youtube creators including LDShadowlady, Jazzghost, Logdotzip, and more.
instructions: 1. Open up the Marketplace on your Minecrafting device and download the pack.
platforms: PC, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Battlerite - All Champions Pack Steam Keys (DLC)
description: Clam your free Battlerite - All Champions Pack DLC Steam Key and unlock all champions for free! Please note the base game Battlerite (Free-to-play) is required to play this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Login and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Redeem your key on Steam after installing the base game Battlerite (free-to-play).
